description: I'm a backend developer specializing in building scalable web systems.
heroDescription: Building high-performance backend systems that handle millions of requests daily. 5+ years of expertise in PHP, Laravel, Symfony, Docker, and Kubernetes. Transforming complex business requirements into reliable, scalable solutions with clean code and DevOps best practices.

aboutMeDescription: I'm a backend developer specializing in building robust and scalable web systems. I work with PHP (Mezzio, Symfony) and actively learning Golang. I adhere to clean architecture principles, DDD, and SOLID. I have experience working in cross-functional teams, practice TDD and code review. I'm passionate about DevOps tools, containerization, and process automation. In my spare time, I study new technologies, participate in pet projects, and contribute to open source to maintain a high technical level and stay up to date with modern approaches.
achievement1: 1+ years of commercial development with PHP (Mezzio, Symfony)
achievement2: Experience with Linux, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD setup and observability services
achievement3: Maintain own backend projects and participate in open source initiatives on GitHub
achievement4: Experience working in agile and scrum teams with code review, TDD and architectural discussions
achievement5: Create games in Unity (C#) in my spare time as a way to expand my horizons
experienceDescription: Development and maintenance of backend services for a high-load CRM system.
experienceAchievement1: Developed REST API for integration with external services (CRM, payment systems)
experienceAchievement2: Optimized SQL queries and indices, increasing performance by 35%
experienceAchievement3: Implemented message queues (RabbitMQ) for asynchronous task processing
experienceAchievement4: Refactored legacy code with unit test coverage (PHPUnit)
